content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing fictional character traits here, as Peter Schmidt I'd try to leverage this interest in my favor during the negotiation. However, in this text-based scenario, I'm limited to focus on the rental price. So, to start the negotiation, I might say: 'Considering the prime location and the modern amenities, I was initially thinking of 1,300 Euros, but as a goodwill gesture, I'm open to reconsidering, given your interest.' Remember, in a real-life situation, proper legal procedures and ethical standards in real-estate transactions should be strictly adhered to.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The price is too high for me. Given the fact the apartment is unfurnished, I'm willing to pay 1,000 euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly falls short of my initial expectations, considering the location and quality of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished status, a rate of 1,200 euros would be more reasonable. I can also offer a 12-month lease term.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While the 12-month lease term is a positive offer, the suggested price of 1,200 Euros is still a concession from my initial thoughts, but I'm willing to consider it. 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euros for a 12-month lease!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
